name: The Life Aquatic
description:
Explore stations and environments located at the depths of the oceans and help save the ecosystem.

For now the goal is to try to reach Officer Finnegan's (your character) quarters (room with bed and desk and library).

ALT+F4 when you reach it or after tired of exploring the station.

Controls:

WASD to move around and mouse to look around with camera.

Credits: 

Ambiance Music:

Nul Tiel Records - Fireflies

Skratchhikken - Underwater sound loop

Project conceived during the Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #4.

Theme: Underwater.

April 8th - April 11th 2022
